ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] patch messed up my sound in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: We managed to kill VS last night (for the first time as a guild), despite the bouncing HP problem. Although it really ticked off the Clerics.  He dropped Bard
ygData.messageBody:
We managed to kill VS last night (for the first time as a guild), despite the bouncing HP problem.
Although it really ticked off the Clerics. He dropped Bard pants! (I didn't get them, but I moved up to
first in line.)

Kenross Cantoforjado, 54 songs, Innoruuk


"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:

> grats on Hosh btw Halana, he's no joke. tomorrow night we're going back to
> kill PD and all her friends again.
>
> Shada
>
> > ROFL, EVERYTHING was messed up last night.. sounds were
> > distorted, health
> > bars showing 2% heath when you hadn't even taken a hit.. my
> > stomach even got
> > upset from the weird sounds... some people had gamma
> > problems, etc. Hoping
> > that they fix this today
> >
> > Halana, 57th Shammie
> > Tani, 35th Bardette
> > Solusek Ro
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
